# Preface {.unnumbered}

TidyMass is a comprehensive computational framework for data processing and analysis of LC-MS data using tidyverse principles. It is developed by the [Shen Lab at Nanyang Technological University, Singapore](https://www.shen-lab.org/).

![](images/shen_lab_logo.png)

Here, you can learn how to use `tidyMass` to do the data processing and analysis for the LC-MS metabolomics data. It contains several parts.
